Title: August: Osage County
Production_Co: Weinstein Company, The, Jean Doumanian Productions, Smokehouse Pictures
Cast: Meryl Streep, Julia Roberts, Chris Cooper, Ewan McGregor, Margo Martindale, Sam Shepard, Dermot Mulroney, Julianne Nicholson, Juliette Lewis, Abigail Breslin, Benedict Cumberbatch, Misty Upham, Will Coffey, Newell Alexander, Jerry Stahl
Plot: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them. Violet Weston (Meryl Streep) has cancer and a propensity for pills and alcohol. She's a difficult woman to deal with and her husband has finally had enough. Violet's family gathers including middle daughter Ivy, youngest daughter Karen (with her new fianc√©), eldest daughter Barbara (with her separated husband and teenage daughter), and her sister Mattie Fae (with her husband and son in tow). A family tragedy causes tensions to run high and secrets to come out. The Weston women will be forced to examine themselves and their lives whether they want to or not. Welcome to Osage County, Oklahoma in the sweltering heat of August. Written by napierslogs
Keywords: pedophilia, incestuous relationship, based on play, oklahoma, secret
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 60 nominations.
Actors: Meryl Streep, Dermot Mulroney, Julia Roberts
Description: Directed by John Wells.  With Meryl Streep, Dermot Mulroney, Julia Roberts, Juliette Lewis. A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.
